item.title: hdu1069 Monkey and Banana (最长下降子序列)
item.description: C - Monkey and Banana **Time Limit:**1000MS **Memory Limit:**32768KB 64bit IO Format:%I64d & %I64u Submit Status Description A group of researchers are designing an experiment to test the IQ of a monkey. They will hang a banana at the roof of a building, and at the mean time, provide the monkey with some blocks. If the monkey is clever enough, it shall be able to reach the banana by placing
